023
024package org.opt4j.operators.mutate;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
027
028import com.google.inject.Inject;
029import com.google.inject.Singleton;
030
031/**
032 * Constant mutation rate. The {@link MutationRate} is set once.
033 * 
034 * @author lukasiewycz
035 * 
036 */
037@Singleton
038public class ConstantMutationRate implements MutationRate {
039
040        protected final double rate;
041
042        /**
043         * Constructs a {@link ConstantMutationRate} with a given value.
044         * 
045         * @param rate
046         *            the mutation rate value
047         */
048        @Inject
049        public ConstantMutationRate(@Constant(value = "rate", namespace = ConstantMutationRate.class) double rate) {
050                this.rate = rate;
051        }
052
053        /*
054         * (non-Javadoc)
055         * 
056         * @see org.opt4j.operator.mutate.MutationRate#get()
057         */
058        @Override
059        public double get() {
060                return rate;
061        }
062
063        /*
064         * (non-Javadoc)
065         * 
066         * @see org.opt4j.operator.mutate.MutationRate#set(double)
067         */
068        @Override
069        public void set(double value) {
070                // do nothing
071        }
072
073}
